channel.title: Project on Dammit, Jim!
channel.description: Recent content in Project on Dammit, Jim!

item.title: Atom-Panels
item.description: Package for handling pane splitting in Atom, ~600 downloads on APM.

item.title: dammitjim.co.uk
item.description: This site! Built with the Hugo static site generator.

item.title: Lobby
item.description: A Twitch stream browser for the desktop! This project was used to learn electron and was built using React / Redux, it was a lot of fun and I would one day like to return to it. Used a golang microservice as a middleman to authenticate and cache twitch request / responses.

item.title: Casts
item.description: Leverage the iTunes search API to get podcast information, concurrently normalise the returned data and prepare it for storage in a seperate service API. Originally built for an RSS scraping project I was working on.
